sentences.en: Bryant said he would probably not tape his pinkie and ring fingers together tonight.
sentences.cn: 科比说今晚他可能不会把右小指缠起来.

sentences.en: He pushes his glasses up his nose with his pinkie.
sentences.cn: 他用小指将眼镜往鼻子上方推了推。

sentences.en: How he copes with a torn ligament in his pinkie remains to be seen.
sentences.cn: 现在他受到小手指韧带伤的困扰.

sentences.en: I slipped the wedding ring on my pinkie and there It'stayed.
sentences.cn: 于是我把戒指戴在自己的小指上,一直戴到现在.

sentences.en: My little pinkie got caught in the door.
That's what happens when your pinkie is all the way over here.
sentences.cn: 那就是当你的小拇指一直处于那种状态时所发生的.

sentences.en: The Pink Pinkie Club should volunteer for the Red Cross class.
sentences.cn: 粉红便衣侦探俱乐部应该自愿参加红十字会的课程.

sentences.en: To make a promise, two people generally hook their pinkie fingers together.
sentences.cn: 两人把小手指勾在一起一般表示做出一项承诺.
